Description: Calvin Looney died from the result of internal bleeding from an injury to his eye which occured during an assault and battery. 2012-03 Brian Warren pled guilty to robbery and Lamontrae Davis pled guilty to involuntary manslaughter and robbery following a Grand Jury indictment in 2011-06.

column4: James W. Adams died from a gunshot wound to the chest; 2011-05-05 Cyntez Fitzgerald was indicted on one count of capital murder, one count of robbery, and two counts of use of a firearm by a convicted felon.
